title: Idas Dans
description: Idas Dans is a book about a young woman, 18 years old, who gets diagnosed with acute leucemia. Her mother has written the book that goes through the 14 months of her horrible illness, until her death.The book is filled with love, laughter, tears, sorrow and joy. It is about a very strong young woman, her parents, her three older sisters and brother, and her boyfriend and her other friends.
author: Gunnhild Corwin
